citation_details.title: MEG-BIDS, the brain imaging data structure extended to magnetoencephalography
citation_details.author: G Niso, KJ Gorgolewski, E Bock, et al.
citation_details.abstract: We present a significant extension of the Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) to support the  specific aspects of magnetoencephalography (MEG) data. MEG measures brain activity with
citation_details.short_author: G Niso, KJ Gorgolewski, E Bock, et al.
